mapper.select: select EMP_NO as empNo, EMP_NAME as empName, JOB as job, MGR as mgr, HIRE_DATE as hireDate, SAL as sal, COMM as comm, DEPT_NO as deptNo from EMP where EMP_NO = #{empNo}
mapper.insert: insert into EMP (EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, JOB, MGR, HIRE_DATE, SAL, COMM, DEPT_NO) values (#{empNo}, #{empName}, #{job}, #{mgr,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sal,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{comm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{deptNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: update EMP set EMP_NAME = #{empName}, JOB = #{job}, MGR = #{mgr,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HIRE_DATE = #{hireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, SAL = #{sal,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, COMM = #{comm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DEPT_NO = #{deptNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where EMP_NO = #{empNo}
